Draft for
Agile Project Management
Plan and create unique products in fast-moving environments. Draft embraces all Agile workflows with flexibility, simplicity, and ease.

Encourage communication and maximize transparency with these features
Story Cards
Manage projects visually by gathering critical information about user stories on useful digital cards.
Jira Integration
Streamline your team’s workflow in real-time with bi-directional syncing between Draft and Jira.
Voting
Improve team decision-making by making sticky-notes or story card voteable.
Polling booth mode
Allow team members to add ideas without them being visible to others.
